game.name: Hamster Slam
game.desc: Description: Knock the other hamster balls out of the ring! Controls: * Arrow Keys - Move player one's hamster (green hamster ball) * ESDF - In 2-player mode, move player two's hamster (red hamster ball) * P - Pause menu. Allows selecting 2 player mode and activating/deactivating Super Bounce mode * X - Start a new game when round ends
